forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 45, with temperatures rising to around 47 overnight. East wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and a chance of thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. Southeast wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely and a chance of thunderstorms before 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. Southwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after 8am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 64. West wind 6 to 9 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday

forecast.name: Thursday Night

forecast.name: Friday

forecast.shortForecast: Rain Likely then Rain Showers Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely before 8pm, then rain showers likely. Cloudy, with a low around 37. North wind 5 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
